test.dropdownSql: SELECT TRX_FEE_MODEL_ID AS GOID, TRX_FEE_MODEL_NAME AS GONAME FROM TRX_FEE_MODEL WHERE TRX_FEE_MODEL_ACTIVE = 1 ORDER BY TRX_FEE_MODEL_NAME
test.sql: UPDATE TRX_PRODUCT SET TRX_FEE_MODEL_ID= $input, TRX_PRODUCTTRAIL_GO_USER_ID = $donebyUserId WHERE TRX_PRODUCT_ID = $primaryId

test.sql: UPDATE TRX_PRODUCT SET TRX_PRODUCT_FINANCE_HEAD_ID= $input , TRX_FEE_MODEL_ID = $2Input, TRX_PRODUCTTRAIL_GO_USER_ID = $donebyUserId WHERE TRX_PRODUCT_ID = $primaryId
UPDATE TRX_PRODUCT SET TRX_PRODUCT_DECIMALS_SHARES= $Input, TRX_PRODUCTTRAIL_GO_USER_ID = $donebyUserId WHERE TRX_PRODUCT_ID = $primaryId
test.dropdownSql: SELECT TRC_TRADETYPE_ID AS GOID, TRC_TRADETYPE_NAME AS GONAME FROM TRC_TRADETYPE WHERE TRC_TRADETYPE_PROGID IN ('buy','sell','ssw', 'bsw','ti','to','toti','bid','ask')
test.sql: DELETE FROM TRX_CONNECT_TRADETYPE WHERE TRX_CONNECT_TRADETYPE_TABLE = 'TRX_PRODUCT' AND TRX_CONNECT_TRADETYPE_FOREIGNKEY_ID = $primaryID AND TRC_TRADETYPE_ID = $input UPDATE TRX_PRODUCT SET TRX_PRODUCTTRAIL_GO_USER_ID = $donebyUserId WHERE TRX_PRODUCT_ID = $primaryId
test.dropdownSql: SELECT TRC_TRADETYPE_ID AS GOID, TRC_TRADETYPE_NAME AS GONAME FROM TRC_TRADETYPE WHERE TRC_TRADETYPE_PROGID IN ('buy','sell','ssw', 'bsw','ti','to','toti','bid','ask')
test.sql: INSERT INTO TRX_CONNECT_TRADETYPE (TRX_CONNECT_TRADETYPE_TABLE ,TRX_CONNECT_TRADETYPE_FOREIGNKEY_ID ,TRC_TRADETYPE_ID ) SELECT 'TRX_PRODUCT' ,$primaryID ,$input FROM TRC_TRADETYPE WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT TRX_CONNECT_TRADETYPE_FOREIGNKEY_ID FROM TRX_CONNECT_TRADETYPE WHERE TRX_CONNECT_TRADETYPE_TABLE = 'TRX_PRODUCT' AND TRX_CONNECT_TRADETYPE_FOREIGNKEY_ID = $primaryID AND TRC_TRADETYPE_ID = $input ) AND TRC_TRADETYPE_ID =$input UPDATE TRX_PRODUCT SET TRX_PRODUCTTRAIL_GO_USER_ID = $donebyUserId WHERE TRX_PRODUCT_ID = $primaryId
test.dropdownSql: SELECT TRX_PRODUCT_ID as GOID, TRX_PRODUCT_NAME as GONAME FROM TRX_PRODUCT WHERE TRX_PRODUCT_ACTIVE = 1 ORDER BY GONAME
test.sql: DELETE FROM TRX_CONNECT_PIPELINE_PRODUCT WHERE TRX_PRODUCT_ID = $PrimaryID INSERT INTO TRX_CONNECT_PIPELINE_PRODUCT ( TRX_PRODUCT_ID ,TRX_PIPELINE_ID ) SELECT $PrimaryID ,TRX_PIPELINE_ID FROM TRX_CONNECT_PIPELINE_PRODUCT WHERE TRX_PRODUCT_ID = $Input UPDATE TRX_PRODUCT SET TRX_PRODUCT_MIN_ORDER_AMOUNT =AA. TRX_PRODUCT_MIN_ORDER_AMOUNT ,TRX_AVAILABILITY_ID =AA.TRX_AVAILABILITY_ID ,TRX_PRODUCTGROUP_ID =AA.TRX_PRODUCTGROUP_ID ,TRX_PRODUCT_CASH_HEAD_ID =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_CASH_HEAD_ID ,TRX_PRODUCT_DECIMALS_SHARES =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_DECIMALS_SHARES ,TRX_PRODUCT_DECIMALS_PRICES =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_DECIMALS_PRICES ,TRX_FEE_MODEL_ID =AA.TRX_FEE_MODEL_ID ,TRX_BANKACCOUNTMANAGEMENT_ID =AA.TRX_BANKACCOUNTMANAGEMENT_ID ,TRX_SUPPLIER_BANKACCOUNT_ID =AA.TRX_SUPPLIER_BANKACCOUNT_ID ,TRX_PRODUCT_FEETYPE =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_FEETYPE ,TRX_PRODUCT_FEETYPE_SUPPLIER =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_FEETYPE_SUPPLIER ,TRC_PRODUCTTYPE_ID =AA.TRC_PRODUCTTYPE_ID ,TRX_PRODUCT_ISCASH =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_ISCASH ,TRX_AXYSMODEL_ID =AA.TRX_AXYSMODEL_ID ,TRC_SHAREORDERTYPE_ID =AA.TRC_SHAREORDERTYPE_ID ,TRX_FEE_SUPPLIER_MODEL_ID =AA.TRX_FEE_SUPPLIER_MODEL_ID ,TRX_PRODUCT_CNOTETYPE =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_CNOTETYPE ,TRX_PRODUCT_CASHUPFRONT_AVAILABILITY_ID =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_CASHUPFRONT_AVAILABILITY_ID ,TRX_COSTCENTER_ID =AA.TRX_COSTCENTER_ID ,TRX_BANKACCOUNTMANAGEMENT_INTERNAL_ID =AA.TRX_BANKACCOUNTMANAGEMENT_INTERNAL_ID ,TRX_PRODUCT_GIB_HEAD_ID =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_GIB_HEAD_ID ,GO_TYPE_CALCULATION_ID =AA.GO_TYPE_CALCULATION_ID ,TRX_PRODUCT_MIN_ORDER_UNITS =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_MIN_ORDER_UNITS ,TRX_PRODUCT_FLAG_INTERNAL_SWITCH =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_FLAG_INTERNAL_SWITCH ,TRX_PRODUCT_LEVERAGE_FACTOR =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_LEVERAGE_FACTOR ,TRX_PRODUCT_SELL_AMOUNTFIELD =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_SELL_AMOUNTFIELD ,TRX_PRODUCT_SWITCH_AMOUNTFIELD =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_SWITCH_AMOUNTFIELD ,TRX_PRODUCT_SPLIT_PERCENT =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_SPLIT_PERCENT ,TRX_PRODUCT_FINANCE_HEAD_ID_FREEPOST =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_FINANCE_HEAD_ID_FREEPOST ,TRX_PRODUCT_FINANCE_HEAD_ID =AA.TRX_PRODUCT_FINANCE_HEAD_ID, TRX_PRODUCTTRAIL_GO_USER_ID = $donebyUserId FROM TRX_PRODUCT, TRX_PRODUCT AA WHERE TRX_PRODUCT.TRX_PRODUCT_ID = $PrimaryID AND AA.TRX_PRODUCT_ID = $Input

test.sql: UPDATE TRX_TRANSACTION SET GO_STATUS_ID= $input, GO_USER_DONE_BY_ID= $donebyUserId WHERE TRX_TRANSACTION_ID = $primaryId

DECLARE @statusNew INT SELECT @statusNew = TRC_PAYMENTSTATUS_ID FROM TRC_PAYMENTSTATUS WHERE TRC_PAYMENTSTATUS_PROGID = 'NEW'
DECLARE @headStatusDis INT SELECT @headStatusDis = TRC_PAYMENTHEADERSTATUS_ID FROM TRC_PAYMENTHEADERSTATUS WHERE TRC_PAYMENTHEADERSTATUS_PROGID = 'DISCARDED'
DECLARE @paymentID INT DECLARE payment_cursor CURSOR FOR SELECT TRX_PAYMENT_ID FROM TRX_PAYMENT WHERE TRX_PAYMENTHEADER_ID = $primaryId
OPEN payment_cursor
FETCH NEXT FROM payment_cursor INTO @paymentID
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO TRX_PAYMENTSTATUS( TRC_PAYMENTSTATUS_ID , TRX_PAYMENTSTATUS_DATE , TRX_PAYMENTSTATUS_COMMENTS , GO_USER_ID , TRX_PAYMENT_ID ) VALUES( @statusNew , getdate() , 'Multi-edit resend of paymentfile, comment: ' + $input , $donebyUserId , @paymentID )
FETCH NEXT FROM payment_cursor INTO @paymentID END
UPDATE TRX_PAYMENT SET TRC_PAYMENTSTATUS_ID = @statusNew , TRX_PAYMENT_DATE_SENT = NULL , TRX_PAYMENTHEADER_ID = NULL WHERE TRX_PAYMENTHEADER_ID = $primaryId
UPDATE TRX_PAYMENTHEADER SET TRC_PAYMENTHEADERSTATUS_ID = @headStatusDis WHERE TRX_PAYMENTHEADER_ID = $primaryId

UPDATE TRX_PAYMENT SET TRX_PAYMENT_DUEDATE = $input WHERE TRX_PAYMENT_ID = $primaryId
INSERT INTO TRX_PAYMENTSTATUS( TRC_PAYMENTSTATUS_ID , TRX_PAYMENTSTATUS_DATE , TRX_PAYMENTSTATUS_COMMENTS , GO_USER_ID , TRX_PAYMENT_ID ) SELECT TRX_PAYMENT.TRC_PAYMENTSTATUS_ID , GetDate() , 'Multi-edit change due date, comment: ' + $2input , $donebyUserId , $primaryId FROM TRX_PAYMENT WHERE TRX_PAYMENT_ID = $primaryId
test.dropdownSql: SELECT TRC_PAYMENTSTATUS_ID AS GOID , TRC_PAYMENTSTATUS_NAME AS GONAME FROM TRC_PAYMENTSTATUS
test.sql:
UPDATE TRX_PAYMENT SET TRC_PAYMENTSTATUS_ID = $input WHERE TRX_PAYMENT_ID = $primaryId
INSERT INTO TRX_PAYMENTSTATUS( TRC_PAYMENTSTATUS_ID , TRX_PAYMENTSTATUS_DATE , TRX_PAYMENTSTATUS_COMMENTS , GO_USER_ID , TRX_PAYMENT_ID ) SELECT $input , GetDate() , 'Multi-edit change status, comment: ' + $2input , $donebyUserId , $primaryId FROM TRX_PAYMENT WHERE TRX_PAYMENT_ID = $primaryId
test.dropdownSql: SELECT UserID AS GOID, fullName AS GONAME FROM X_V_USER order by Fullname
test.sql:
UPDATE SPS_PERIODIC SET SPS_PERIODIC_CUSTOMFIELD2 = $2Input, GO_USER_LASTUPDATED_BY_ID = $donebyUserId WHERE SPS_PERIODIC_ID = $primaryId
DECLARE @DepartmentID INT SELECT @DepartmentID = GO_DEPARTMENT_ID FROM GO_DEPARTMENT WHERE GO_DEPARTMENT_ACTIVE = 1 AND GO_DEPARTMENT_EXTERNALID = $input
IF @DepartmentID IS NOT NULL BEGIN DECLARE @UserID INT SELECT @UserID = GO_USER_ID FROM GO_USER WHERE GO_DEPARTMENT_ID = @DepartmentID AND GO_USER_ACTIVE = 1
DECLARE @DistributorID INT SELECT @DistributorID = DPT.TRX_DISTRIBUTOR_ID FROM GO_DEPARTMENT DPT INNER JOIN TRX_DISTRIBUTOR DIS ON DPT.TRX_DISTRIBUTOR_ID = DIS.TRX_DISTRIBUTOR_ID WHERE GO_DEPARTMENT_ID = @DepartmentID AND TRX_DISTRIBUTOR_ACTIVE = 1
UPDATE TXI_USERSHARING SET GO_DEPARTMENT_ID = @DepartmentID, GO_USER_ID = @UserID, TRX_DISTRIBUTOR_ID = @DistributorID WHERE TXI_USERSHARING_TABLE = 'SPS_PERIODIC' AND TXI_USERSHARING_FOREIGNKEY = $primaryId END ELSE BEGIN RAISERROR (N'The department is not existing.', 18,1, NULL,0) END
